definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: Akxw, Acco, in Asher, Ju Jdg 1:31, + Jos 19:30 (P), rdg. ´[[ע]] for MT [[עֻמָּה]], Di Kau Benn Ency. Bib., after LXX Codd.; a seaport N. of Carmel (= Acre, Ptolemais), mod. ‘Akka, cf. Buhl:Geogr. 228 (Egypt. ‘A-ka, )Akh WMM:As. u. Eur. 181; As. Akkû, COT:Gloss, TelAm. Ak-ka).
